trends: There have been no other sightings in Healdsburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: metallic/steel bright orange red glowing circular with triangular edges but at different angles shaped like end of squid/stingray with 3-4 lights on side
divs: sighting detailstwo days ago around 6pm clear crisp quiet blue sky after walking our dog and picking raspberries, my gf tapped me hard and said: "hey look! what's that?!" we look straight above right up and see (very high up higher than planes go but big enough to see) - a hovering beautiful very shiny metallic\steel extremely bright orange and red glowing 'aircraft'. the shape was round with triangular edges shaped sorta like an end of a squid in certain angles. after abt 4 seconds it decided to glide off vertical very fast upward. you could tell it was going really fast but amazingly no vapor or noise :) this wasn't the first time we've seen unidentifiable 'aircraft' in our area. 3rd time actually. it's amazing when you get to see 'stuff' like this. zoom in on the pic -- this was when it was really far already about to fade off upward. -- btw no its not a pic trick and no i wasn't and not on anything! lol pretty awesome. we waved to it. eerie but amazed and it was beautiful.
